c74object.name: maxscore.store
c74object.digest: Store a score and expose it to the pattr system.
c74object.description:
maxscore.store
is a js object that stores a score and exposes it to the pattr system. It receives XML data contents from the second outlet of com.algomusic.max.MaxScore and requires a bang to send out the score to the second outlet of another com.algomusic.max.MaxScore instance.

method.name: anything
method.description: In left inlet: Content to be stored.

entry.name: list
entry.description: XML data for com.algomusic.max.MaxScore's second inlet.
